title: Distraction Work 1 & Alone Time 2
summary: Introduce mild distractions and extend comfortable separations.

lessons.title: Distraction Work 1 — Simple Challenges
lessons.objective: Maintain Sit/Down with mild distractions nearby.
steps: Cue Sit; drop a soft object 2m away; reward staying.
Add tiny movement (step sideways) while puppy holds.
supportGuidelines: Lower difficulty if you get failures.

lessons.title: Alone Time 2 — Build Duration
lessons.objective: Comfortable short alone periods with enrichment.
supportGuidelines: Use white noise or calm music if helpful.
If whining: shorten next session; reward calm on return.
lessons.safetyNotes: Use only vet-approved chews during absences.

lessons.title: Calm Greetings 2 — With Visitors
lessons.objective: Hold Sit for greeting with new people.
steps: Puppy sits before greeting; visitor pets only while seated.
If stand/jump: visitor pauses attention; handler resets.
supportGuidelines: Use leash to prevent rehearsal of jumping.
lessons.safetyNotes: Avoid overwhelming the puppy with large groups.
